model.sql: select _ts, cluster_id, last(grants_expire_time) from log.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to partition by cluster_id

select _wstart as ts, dnode_ep, data_dir_level, data_dir_name, last(used)  / last(total)  as used from log.taosd_dnodes_data_dirs where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to partition by dnode_ep, data_dir_level, data_dir_name interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, dnode_ep, (last(io_read_disk) + last(io_write_disk)) / 1024 as taosd_io from log.taosd_dnodes_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to partition by dnode_ep interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts,  dnode_ep, last(cpu_engine) as taosd from log.taosd_dnodes_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to partition by dnode_ep  interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, dnode_ep, last(mem_engine) / last(mem_total) as taosd from log.taosd_dnodes_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to partition by dnode_ep interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, dnode_ep, avg(`count`) as `inserted_rows`  from log.taosd_sql_req where sql_type = 'inserted_rows' and _ts > $from and _ts <= $to partition by dnode_ep interval($interval) fill(null)

select  _wstart as ts, cluster_id,  CASE  WHEN max(grants_timeseries_total)  > 0 THEN max(grants_timeseries_used)  /max(grants_timeseries_total)    ELSE 0    END AS result from log.taosd_cluster_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to partition by cluster_id interval($interval)
select _wstart as ts, cluster_id,  avg(`count`) as `select_count`  from log.taos_sql_req where sql_type = 'select' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to partition by cluster_id interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, cluster_id,  avg(`count`) as `insert_count`  from log.taos_sql_req where sql_type = 'insert' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to partition by cluster_id interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, dnode_ep, avg(system_net_in) as system_net_in from log.taosd_dnodes_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to partition by dnode_ep  interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, dnode_ep, avg(system_net_out) as system_net_out from log.taosd_dnodes_info where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to partition by dnode_ep interval($interval) fill(null)
select create_time as ts, exec_usec/1000 as cost_ms from performance_schema.perf_queries where create_time >= $from and create_time <= $to
